body.name: Retro Countertop Microwave Oven, Large 0.7Cu.ft, 700-Watt, Cold Rolled Steel Countertop with Time Setting, Glass Turntable Plate, Pre-Programmed Cooking Settings, LED Display, Child Lock (Rose Gold)
features: 5 Microwave Power: This microwave oven is designed with 5 microwave power levels (100% to 20%) to quickly and efficiently heat food in 60 minutes while maximizing power savings. Removable glass turntable is included to achieve 360°heating and make food more uniform. This product is not for sale in California

Auto Reminder & Time Setting: Equipped with an auto reminder function, which means that you will hear one beep once you finish cooking. More advantages include an LED digital display which has a time and weight setting function as well as clearly shows remaining cooking time.

Auto-cook Preset Programs: Come with default cooking menu to heat your favorite foods. Press the desired pre-programmed button and the microwave automatically starts. Easily make popcorn, potato, pizza, frozen vegetables, or reheat a beverage or dinner plate.

Child Safety Lock: Child safety locks can effectively prevent children or others from accidentally using the microwave oven, thus eliminating all possible dangers. The compact size is ideal for apartment kitchens, vacation homes, offices and dorms.

Retro and High-End Look: This retro style microwave oven with rounded buttons and curved handle and vibrant colors matches perfectly with any kind of kitchen. It features several practical functions that could certainly satisfy your expectation towards a microwave.
body.description: Description:This 0.7 Cubic foot 700 watt microwave oven features user-friendly multi-function design to meet your usage needs. 5 power levels and removable turntable in a compact microwave to delivers fast, even cooking and delicious results. The large LED digital display has a time and weight setting function and can also display cooking time remaining. Convenient auto-reminder feature lets you hear beeps after cooking. Its smaller size is ideal for apartment kitchens, vacation homes, offices or dorms.Features:The LED display panel can display the cooking time remainingEnjoy one touch cooking for six of the most popular microwaved foods360°glass turntable rotates to make food more uniformEquipped with 5 power mode, sound on/off button and child safety lockChild safety lock to prevent unsupervised use by childAutomatic alert function with a beep sound after cookingCome with time and weight setting functionCool-touch rounded buttons further improve the user experienceRetro design with vibrant color that fits all kitchen stylesSpecifications:Material: Steel, glass Dimension: 18"(L)×14"(W)×10"(H)Capacity: 0.7 Cu. Ft (20 L)Output Power: 700 WRated Voltage: 120 VFrequency: 60 HzWeight: 23 lbs Package Includes: 1 X Microwave Oven1 X Manual

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 59 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #145,765 in Kitchen & Dining (See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining) #156 in Countertop Microwave Ovens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New kitchen family
reviews.reviewText: It does everything we need as we mostly use it for reheating foods and making occasional popcorn and baked potatoes even though we know it can do more. What I like most is the size as it fits so well in our limited counter space. We are glad it's a new addition to our kitchen family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great small microwave! It is so adorable. I have owned it for about six months now and the copper color on the handles and the knobs are not wearing off. It is big enough to put a full-size plate in to heat up your dinner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working within first two weeks.
reviews.reviewText: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY. First of all my microwave stopped working on the second week and would not heat anything up no matter how long it was in there.Then when I put in a refund request they tried asking that I only take a 50% refund. I’ve shipped it back to them and received no refund. Feels like I just got scammed $140 some dollars and Amazon has done nothing about it…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love red!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this microwave. I am redoing my kitchen in all red appliances! I only gave it a four-star review because the keypad is very difficult to use with just my finger. When I press I have to use a pencil eraser. Otherwise it functions perfectly so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The function of this microwave oven is similar to the ones I have used before, but it is more beautiful. It is small enough to be placed on the dining table. I hope it can be used for a long time. After all, this is very important!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a small kitchen
reviews.reviewText: We haven't had a new microwave in 20 plus years and the old one was dorm room size and 600 watts. Although this one is only 700 watts it packs a lot of power into a small spaced machine. Really happy with it.Also it's quite attractive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Met my space and color expectations!!
reviews.reviewText: Am quite pleased with this microwave because not only was it small enough to fit our space but it had the copper accents I was wanting for our kitchen! It says “rose gold” but it works well to blend in with copper accents. The knobs are indeed “retro” and not the current digital feel. Has worked great!! I thought the price was great as well!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit on my kitchen counter
reviews.reviewText: Great size for my small old fashioned kitchen, I placed it on a unused corner between stove and sink, perfect spot for this microwave. It's easy to use with the preset cooking timers, and turning knob is more convenient for setting up desired time. Round opening handle bar is way easier to use than pull to open microwave. For the noise part it's the same as any other ones.
